title: The role of community-wide wearing of face mask for control of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) epidemic due to SARS-CoV-2
quote: "Community-wide mask wearing may contribute to the control of COVID-19"

title: To mask or not to mask: Modeling the potential for face mask use by the general public to curtail the COVID-19 pandemic
quote: "broad adoption of even relatively ineffective face masks may meaningfully reduce community transmission of COVID-19"

title: Reduction of secondary transmission of SARS-CoV-2 in households by face mask use, disinfection and social distancing: a cohort study in Beijing, China
quote: "The study confirms the highest risk of transmission prior to symptom onset, and provides the first evidence of the effectiveness of mask use"

title: Surgical Mask Partition Reduces the Risk of Noncontact Transmission in a Golden Syrian Hamster Model for Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19)
quote: "This is the first in vivo experimental evidence to support the possible benefit of surgical mask in prevention of COVID-19 transmission"

title: Community Use Of Face Masks And COVID-19: Evidence From A Natural Experiment Of State Mandates In The US
quote: "Mandating face mask use in public is associated with a decline in the daily COVID-19 growth rate by 0.9, 1.1, 1.4, 1.7, and 2.0 percentage points in 1–5, 6–10, 11–15, 16–20, and 21 or more days after state face mask orders were signed, respectively"

title: Trends in County-Level COVID-19 Incidence in Counties With and Without a Mask Mandate — Kansas, June 1–August 23, 2020
quote: "After July 3, COVID-19 incidence decreased in 24 counties with mask mandates but continued to increase in 81 counties without mask mandates"

title: Effectiveness of Adding a Mask Recommendation to Other Public Health Measures to Prevent SARS-CoV-2 Infection in Danish Mask Wearers
quote: "the findings were inconclusive and cannot definitively exclude a 46% reduction to a 23% increase in infection of mask wearers [...] this trial did not address the effects of masks as source control or as protection in settings where social distancing and other public health measures are not in effect"

title: Face masks considerably reduce COVID-19 cases in Germany
quote: "we conclude that 20 d after becoming mandatory face masks have reduced the number of new infections by around 45%. As economic costs are close to zero compared to other public health measures, masks seem to be a cost-effective means to combat COVID-19"

title: Mask-wearing and control of SARS-CoV-2 transmission in the USA: a cross-sectional study
quote: "The widespread reported use of face masks combined with physical distancing increases the odds of SARS-CoV-2 transmission control"

title: Transmission of COVID-19 in 282 clusters in Catalonia, Spain: a cohort study
quote: "We observed no association of risk of transmission with reported mask usage by contacts"

title: Decline in COVID-19 Hospitalization Growth Rates Associated with Statewide Mask Mandates — 10 States, March–October 2020
quote: "10 sites [...] in states with statewide mask mandates reported a decline in weekly COVID-19–associated hospitalization growth rates by up to 5.6 percentage points for adults aged 18–64 years after mandate implementation, compared with growth rates during the 4 weeks preceding implementation of the mandate"

title: Universal masking to control healthcare-associated transmission of severe acute respiratory coronavirus virus 2 (SARS-CoV-2)
quote: "Universal masking with medical face masks was effective in preventing further spread of SARS-CoV-2 in our facility in conjunction with other traditional infection prevention measures"

title: Reported COVID-19 Incidence in Wisconsin High School Athletes in Fall 2020
quote: "No significant associations were found between COVID-19 incidence and face mask use" however "The lack of a significant benefit demonstrated for face mask use may be due to relatively low rates of COVID-19 in Wisconsin during September 2020"

title: Association of Mask Mandates and COVID-19 Case Rates, Hospitalizations, and Deaths in Kansas
quote: "Counties that adopted the July mask mandate in Kansas experienced significantly lower rates of COVID-19 cases, hospitalizations, and deaths compared with those that did not"

title: Analysis of the Effects of COVID-19 Mask Mandates on Hospital Resource Consumption and Mortality at the County Level
quote: "There was no reduction in per-population daily mortality, hospital bed, ICU bed, or ventilator occupancy of COVID-19-positive patients attributable to the implementation of a mask-wearing mandate"

title: School Safety, Masking, and the Delta Variant
quote: "This report demonstrates that even with exponentially rising community cases at the start of the Delta variant surge, schools that implemented universal masking retained low within-school transmission"

title: Impact of community masking on COVID-19: A cluster-randomized trial in Bangladesh
quote: "A randomized-trial of community-level mask promotion in rural Bangladesh during the COVID-19 pandemic shows that the intervention increased mask usage and reduced symptomatic SARS-CoV-2 infections"

title: Association of Child Masking With COVID-19–Related Closures in US Childcare Programs
quote: "This survey study of childcare professionals suggests that masking young children is associated with fewer childcare program closures, enabling in-person education"

title: Mask Effectiveness for Preventing Secondary Cases of COVID-19, Johnson County, Iowa, USA
quote: "Masks significantly reduced virus transmission when worn by both the case-patient and the contact"

title: Evaluating the effectiveness of countywide mask mandates at reducing SARS-CoV-2 infection in the United States
quote: "These data showed statistically significant lower averages of SARS-CoV-2 daily infection in counties that passed mask mandates when compared with counties that did not"

title: The Effectiveness Of Government Masking Mandates On COVID-19 County-Level Case Incidence Across The United States, 2020
quote: "On average, the daily case incidence per 100,000 people in masked counties compared with unmasked counties declined by 23 percent at four weeks, 33 percent at six weeks, and 16 percent across six weeks postintervention"

title: Effectiveness of Face Mask or Respirator Use in Indoor Public Settings for Prevention of SARS-CoV-2 Infection — California, February–December 2021
quote: "Consistent use of a face mask or respirator in indoor public settings was associated with lower odds of a positive SARS-CoV-2 test result (adjusted odds ratio = 0.44)"

title: Effectiveness of face masks in blocking the transmission of SARS-CoV-2: A preliminary evaluation of masks used by SARS-CoV-2-infected individuals
quote: "Our findings suggest the blocking of virus transmission by different types of masks and reinforce the use of masks by both infected and non-infected individuals"

title: State-Level Masking Mandates and COVID-19 Outcomes in the United States
quote: "After 60 days and at a national level, early implementation [of masking mandates] was associated with a 9% reduction in new COVID-19 cases (aRR = 0.91 [95% CI = 0.88, 0.95]) and a 16% reduction in new COVID-19 deaths (aRR = 0.84 [95% CI = 0.76, 0.93])"

title: School Masking Policies and Secondary SARS-CoV-2 Transmission
quote: "universal masking was associated with reduced secondary transmission compared to optional masking"
